homepage.text_6: Ho Chi Minh City University of Natural Resources and Environment, Vietnam.

projectpage.tetx_2: Shoping Web is a web application that allows users to order and sell items. The website is written in C# for the back-end and React-Typescript for the front-end.
projectpage.tetx_4: Newtalker is a program that automatically crawls data from articles and performs text summarization and keyword statistics. The data crawling is done using a program written in C#, while text summarization and statistics are handled by a program written in Python.
projectpage.text_8: Kairos is an Android software written in Flutter on Android Studio, designed to help users view dates(This application is currently being developed).
projectpage.text_10: Drawbattle is a game project using Websocket. Players are divided into 2 sides and proceed to color within a certain period of time, when the time is up, whoever colors the most will win.
projectpage.text_12: Book Store is a book sales management website, developed with ASP.Net MVC using available Templates for the application interface.
